title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million euros is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2018.
Max Revenue in million euros about 297.2 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Revenue in million euros about 6.5 was recorded at Year 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010 to 2013.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
